snippet: Gov. John Kitzhaber is asking the Oregon Lottery to postpone a new site called the ORcade because he is worried that the cartoon graphics and online games may appeal to minors.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kitzhaber is asking the Oregon Lottery to postpone a new site called the ORcade because he is worried that the cartoon graphics and online games may appeal to minors.

headline.main: Oregon: Lottery Is Asked to Delay New Web Site
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Lottery Is Asked to Delay New Web Site
headline.seo: Oregon Governor Wants Delay of Lottery Web Site Launch
